text: TEMPLE COLLEGE NAME (last, first): _____________ Nursing Program FCRemoval/Spr23/NE Indwelling Catheter Removal Critical elements are indicated by an asterisk (*) and must be performed satisfactorily to pass the checkoff. . Student missing more than 2 non-asterisk items will result in not passing the skill. SKILLS TO BE ASSESSED S U COMMENTS Verify Healthcare Provider (HCP) prescription *Wash hands. Identify self to the client as a student nurse *Identify patient using 2 verifiers *Assess the client for allergies. Explain procedure to client and provide privacy Provides privacy to client throughout procedure. *Apply non-sterile/clean gloves. Drain urine tubing into collection bag Empty collection bag into graduated cylinder. *Remove clean gloves, wash hands, and apply clean gloves. Place towel/absorbent pad between legs and under buttocks Remove tape/cath secure *Apply syringe to balloon insertion port and remove all fluid from catheter balloon. Instruct client to take deep breath and remove catheter on expiration. Dispose of equipment and remove gloves *Wash hands.
